script.name: !plugin.autotrade.upgradeShields
script.description: Autotrade - Try to upgrade shields to max

line.comment: * get needed and available amounts of max shield in cargo bay
* do we need to upgrade at all?
* we're just already equipped to the max
* OR have enough shields on board but not all installed
* TODO: can these actually occur? remove if already considered in 'Lib.Cmd.Trade.GetStationBestPrice
* [THIS]-> set command: [COMMAND_GET_WARE] target=$ware target2=null par1=null par2=null
* Ok we're at a buystation, now buy and replace the shields
* now swap shields to best available combo
* TODO: is this really needed? should be handled by get route script.

sval.val: Autotrade - Try to upgrade shields to max
search range
Max amount to buy
get needed and available amounts of max shield in cargo bay
do we need to upgrade at all?
we're just already equipped to the max
OR have enough shields on board but not all installed
we need to BUY
script usage updated for 1.3.5
TODO: can these actually occur? remove if already considered in 'Lib.Cmd.Trade.GetStationBestPrice
* * * Do the upgrade!
[THIS]-> set command: [COMMAND_GET_WARE] target=$ware target2=null par1=null par2=null
set script command: [COMMAND_MK3_6501_UPGRADE_SHIELDS]
replaced by $arrived
skip if [DOCKEDAT] == $buystation
goto label return:
Ok we're at a buystation, now buy and replace the shields
now swap shields to best available combo
TODO: is this really needed? should be handled by get route script.
Ok back to business
